item.title: Making a React Blog and Why You Shouldn't (They Suck)
item.description: The biggest strength of a static pages blog is that it’s all pre-rendered; your website will load lightning-quick and give you great SEO; however, it becomes a massive chore when you attempt to integrate external projects.
